attributes.additional_details: It is unfair that mammals have to suffer so that we can use makeup or cleaning products etc.
attributes.background: We would like the Government to ban all animal testing UK, including for the development of cosmetics, household products and medicines. Alternatives need to be actively funded. Many products that are tested on animals end up not being suitable for humans. Animal testing is outmoded and should end.

departments.name: Department for Environment, Food and Rural Affairs
